positive.valid_data: when user input corect data then user got response 200

negative.wrong_PPID: when user input data using invalid payment provider id, then user got response error
negative.wrong_persenFee: when user input persen fee using string, then user got response error
negative.wrong_fixFee: when user input fix fee using string, then user got response error
negative.wrong_POid: when user input data using invalid payment option id, then user got response error
